sourcesContent:
import "./JobCard.css"; import React, {useState} from "react"; function JobCard({job}){ const [showFullDetails, setShowFullDetails] = useState(false); const toggleDetails = () => { setShowFullDetails(!showFullDetails); }; const truncatedDetails = job.jobDetailsFromCompany .split(' ') .slice(0, 10) .join(' '); return (
Posted 16 days ago
1 applicant
Pinch Role: {job.jobRole} India
{job.jdLink}
Estimated salary: {job.maxJdSalary} - {job.minJdSalary} {job.salaryCurrencyCode}
Description:

{job.jobDetailsFromCompany}

{`Our aim is to bring comfort & convenience to families in their day-to-day household chores and then take them on a journey where they find pleasure in exploring the finer aspects of`}
{`Location: `} {job.location}
{`Experience: `} {job.minExp !== null && job.maxExp !== null ? ( {job.minExp} - {job.maxExp} years ) : job.minExp !== null ? ( {job.minExp}+ years ) : job.maxExp !== null ? ( Up to {job.maxExp} years ) : ( Not specified )}
Easy Apply
); }; export default JobCard;
